attributes.action: persuade the foreign secretary to abandon attenpts to change the law in order to  prevent  the arrest of israeli military officers on suspicion of war crimes against palestinians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ehud Olmert wants our government to protect israeli officers suspected of war crimes against palestinians against arrest and trial.I believe it would be wrong to concede to this request.
